LanguageData.RT_M1078_LMTV.label: M1078 LMTV
LanguageData.RT_M1078_LMTV.description:
A Medium Tactical Truck with 2.5 tons capacity, can switch between 4x4 and 6x6.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x2, Passenger x12
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel:</color> Chemfuel
